content.detailedDescription:
1. i was taking photos of the clouds and took a few consecutive ones and one of them had something in it not sure what it is. 
2. i did not see this until i looked at my photos later on. two photos taken back to back and one of them had this object in it. i just developed it today at cvs. i had enlarged the photo to see it better too. 
3. i take pictures a lot and sometimes find weird objects in them. i do not know what to feel but do believe it may be man made.
4. it appears to be a cylindrical shape with some sort of propeller which looks like it is rotating or emitting something from the top and also leaving a trail of an emission from it.  
5. i also believe there are flying saucers but whether many sightings are or not who knows? i just thought it looked a little strange and offered it up for examination.
6. i did not lose sight i never saw it except in the photo!
content.summary: I did not see it until i looked at my pictures later.

content.detailedDescription: Dropped sister off at bayonne light rail walked home going west suddenly a fire appeared west in the sky  heading toward me then it veered left toward yhe newark airport and the meadow lands arena that was shooting off fireworks.   as i crossed the road a car pulled up next to me and asked if i saw that crazy fire in the sky  i told him yes where he said him and his wife were watching it and thought it was a ufo.  by the time i walked hom i opened my window in my apartment and i swear another appeared outside my window toward the water again .
content.summary: Was walking toward the bay west toward newark spoted fireball car plls up next to me he saw fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friends visited shastra dhara , dehradun. it was a hilly area...After reaching there...We start clicking pics. we decide to take a group photo....My friend took two pics at that time frequently....Both pics were same.....Because he took both pics in less than a second....But then we saw there was something different in one pic ...We zoomed the pic.......We saw there was a ufo capured in that pic.We all were mindblown.We sent that pic to a local newspaper janvani,pic was published in the newspaper next day.....
very strange....It happened....For more detail please contact me.
content.summary: Ufo capured in pic during a group photo

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation at washington dc we were taken pictures of the monument from different angles, i took several pictures of it and one of them shows this object. did not realize it until i browse the pictures in the airplane. i would further analysys of this object.
content.summary: Picture taken, not sure what type or flight object is

content.detailedDescription: Light observed overhead moving very fast heading west. starts making zig zag maneuvers. suddenly  changes altitude of 20,000 feet or so. hovers above building going up and down and moving back and forth at extremely fast speeds. disappears below building and reappears with a red light on the left side of the craft. goes above and below building about 3 times appearing to become invisible and performing extremely maneuverable maneuvers. another aircraft comes into view and then changes course toward other object and disappears. blue object continues to make extreme maneuvers then disappears toward the building for about 5 minutes. then, the object shoots toward the sky at unbelievable speeds, faster than i could blink, it was out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue light changing direction and speed.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9 pm on june 23,2014 my 19 year old grandson was in pool with wife, he looked up saw a round silent very bright light over them. my grandson had his wife come to door to call me. i went out onto deck he pointed at object, it was brilliantly bright ball of light moving with no sound.  i called rest of family out we all saw it, all 8 of us.  it moved at steady speed, brighter than a star, as stated no sound no trail it moved steady. i was able to get one picture with my i phone as it moving away, in a southernly direction from our house. i was trying to get several but only able to get one and then it disappeared. we all truly believe this was a ufo as we have watched numerous planes coming and going out of las vegas, this was not their flight lines. also there was only bright light around the ball like object no other lights, it was silent, moving in a controlled manner. it was not a helicopter, nor any type spot light.  we all felt awed at it.  the object just disappeared after my picture.  i am not good at height though it was too low for a plane.  as i stated it moved in a southern direction from our house and out of no where disappeared. the night was clear only stars no wind temp was about 90 degrees.  when i enlarge the picture there is a bright object but indiscernable .
content.summary: Grandson saw object while in pool had wife get me saw large bright object no sound moving straight line had all family come out got one photo with i phone then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were vacationing in san miguel allende mexico . my wife took a picture of the church located downtown ..But we didnt notice the object until after we look over our pictures. the object is located on the left side.. it maybe something that could be explained but we dont know what it is...Fyi..There are no planes or helicopters that fly around that area..
content.summary: Notice light in picture

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping in the lost creek wilderness area near the rolling creek trail on the north-western part of the valley near wellington lake (appr. 39.335346, -105.407524), appr. 2.5 miles from the lake.
at about 10:30pm on friday june 21, with my son (25 yrs old) and his girlfriend (also 25), we heard a jet flying a normal approach to the denver airport from the south to the northeast.  while peering through the forest canopy in the direction of the jet, i was able to see the flashing lights of the jet at normal altitude high in the sky.  shortly after first seeing the jet's flashing lights moving away in the distance, i saw a vivid, bright green-white, solid light flying through the trees but in front of the "castle", which is a large rock formation at the south side of the valley.  the light was clearly at very low altitude, and was in fact within the confines of the valley, lower than the ridges that form the perimeter.  there was still enough ambient light to see the horizon of the ridges to the south/southeast, and the light was lower than the ridges.  it was in a slightly descending attitude, and i could see it clearly through an opening in the trees, and then intermittently through the tree-cover as it traveled to the north/northeast. i lost sight of it after about 5 seconds.  it appeared to be traveling at about 50 to 70 mph possibly. there as no sound whatsoever from the object.  it did appear that it could have been a small plane or helicopter, but the area is remote, and other than the faint sound of the other jet flying away from our position, there was no engine or other sound from the low altitude light.  highly unlikely that a seaplane could have been attempting a landing on wellington lake, as it is very small, and the sound would certainly have been very loud.  the night was very quiet, and the sounds of campers at wellington lake were audible in the distance from miles away at the time.  my son did catch a glimpse of the object as it passed behind the trees.
we thought it could have possibly been a drone or some sort of remote-controlled object, but the location and time of day made this seem unlikely.  also the light was quite bright, similar to the headlight of a car.  there is no possibility that this was a land vehicle.  the light was viewed with the "castle" as backdrop, which is a sheer cliff around the north sides.  there were certainly people camping at the wellington lake campsites, and someone there may have also seen this object clearly, as it's flight path appeared to be towards the lake.
content.summary: Brief glimpse of light descending through valley area where camping.

content.detailedDescription: About 930ish am heading north on country club toward 89th street when i noticed a bunch of chem trails in the sky. i pulled out my phone while driving to take picture of the trails. after a couple pictures my phone all of sudden froze and simultaneously my truck made a weird clunking sound which i have never heard before. this only lasted a brief second and i took one last picture and continued on to my destination. it was until about an hour later i was looking over my pictures when i noticed in my very last picture there is what looks like a white object streaking through the sky not to far from the chem trails. i did not see this object with my own eyes but it only appeared in the picture that occurred right after the weird behavior of my cell phone and truck. my camera flash was not on, and there was no cars behind me.
content.summary: Trying to take pictures of chem trails, when phone and truck started acted up, noticed afterward object in picture

content.detailedDescription: While driving thru joshua tree, i was filming the landscape and the beauty of the desert, when i got home i decided to take a look at the video that i recorded, i notice on the upper left hand side of the video a shiny object moving in the sky at first i thought it was a plane but as the video continued the object was moving in side to side direction which really caught my eye.
content.summary: Shiny metallic golf ball size object changing directions from east to west thru the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & grand daughter were going to the west part of town to view xmas card lane, when my grand daughter said."look at the fire works"i,m looking all around the ground and saw nothing. she told me to look up in the sky.
there was a long steak of fire from the nw to se. it was said to be a russian sat. returning to earth and burning up. as i looked from under it, to the left side were four silver looking globes in a triangular formation, some where  behind this was a blinking light, these things were not on fire!

i had the feeling something was following it in.

has anyone reported this although it has been many years ago, i still wander.

this only took a very short time to pass to the se horison.

i told my wife at the time, i thought we had seen a ufo.
content.summary: Soviet sat burning up 4 silver objects, triangular 4mation, not on fire

content.detailedDescription:
I parked my car (alone) behind a local airport (krwi) in the middle of the night as a teen hoping to see a plane take off or land. this was definitely sometime between mid-1995 and early 1997, most likely in 1996.

while waiting, i was shocked to see what looked like glitter in the sky, but after a few seconds i realized it was the blinking lights of a number of aircraft. they flew directly over me as i stood on the road, and i could see that there were about ten aircraft flying in a formation. it was night, but i'm positive that i saw their triangular silhouettes against the sky and didn't merely assume a triangular shape based on the lights. the objects all looked the same except the one in front had different or extra lights. at the time, i estimated they were 1000 feet up, but it might have been anywhere between 500 and 1500 feet. as i recall, the formation was basically made of several diagonal lines with three aircraft in each line. i've never seen this same formation, even now when searching on the net.

the craft appeared to fly in a straight line at a constant speed the whole time, and they maintained the formation. they didn't land at the airport or descend or ascend at all. they came from the sw and continued to the ne behind and beyond the trees. nothing else happened. i wasn't abducted. i can't recall any sound, but i probably would have noticed if the craft were very loud or silent. they weren't going very fast like some jets do, but they didn't seem unnaturally slow. the entire event probably lasted a couple of minutes.

i always assumed these were probably military stealth aircraft, but i felt i had seen something unusual, and it always seemed like an odd experience. i now wonder if these could have been related in any way to the prolific black triangle ufo reports, so i wanted to report the event just in case it's a missing piece of some puzzle. i wish i could remember more details. i wasn't drunk or dreaming, and i don't hallucinate. thanks for taking the report.
content.summary: Many triangles in formation flew over airport

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting outside in the grass at a park after the sun went down, when he saw something bright zoom fast in the sky, way faster than an airplane would at that height in the sky. then he couldnt see it anymore and he had no idea what it was. so we kept watching the sky until the object appeared again. the craft would hover, then zoom fast, then stop. there were four lights, two red, two green, and it appears to rotate because the lights change up. this could be some sort of drone because the path of the object covered about the same distance in the 20-30 min we were watching it. but the saucer like shape is very clear in the beginning of the video. also,  i captured the footage with a canon mark 3 camera with a 70-200 mm lens, zoomed in all the way at 200mm. so the object was a few miles from us at least it seems.
content.summary: Craft hovering and flying over arizona for 20-30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Two of my sons, my wife and i saw something on june 21st 2014 at approximately 9:45pm. the sky conditions were cloudy and there were no other lights in the sky, moon, stars, airplanes etc. this orange light was traveling slowly in the eastern sky heading west it then paused and a smaller orange light fell from it and quickly disappeared, the large orange light then changed direction and headed south once again it paused and a small orange light fell from it and quickly disappeared. it then continued to move southwest and apparently gaining altitude disappeared into the clouds. my wife claims to have heard a humming noise before it disappeared the rest of us did not hear it. my youngest son later found out that the space station would be visible at 9:45 near cleveland, but we are 200 miles south of cleveland and the sky was cloudy and i don 't believe the space station flies below the clouds, nor does it change course and jettison items. a couple years back on a very clear evening we saw the space station in the same area as this sighting but it moved quickly and did not change direction. i am a ufo skeptic i don't know why aliens that travel light years need lights, but i can't explain what we saw saturday night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange light paused twice smaller orange light fell from it and quickly disappeared twice large orange light changed direction twice

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were sitting on the beach on the night of june 18th, 2014. there was a thunderstorm to the far east over the gulf in florida. i was enjoying the lightning show as it lit up the dark sky, there was no moon in the sky yet. a reddish orange ball of light caught my eye in the direct south i watched trying to figure out what it was and it vanished as i was watching. i immediately told my wife what i had seen and she did not think much of it until 2 lights appeared to the east of the first light then 4 more lights appeared next to the first 2 lights then 2 more to the left of the 6 lights now illuminated.  made  a total of 8, 6 were in a perfect row and the other 2 were to the left and at a varying angle. i got the impression they were all part of the same craft. they appeared only for a few seconds and then began to disappear at different intervals.

we stayed on the beach another hour or so, but never seen the lights again.  i had no way to tell the height or elevation of the lights but if they were part of the same craft, this thing had to be several hundred feet long.  there was no noise affiliated with the lights.  there were lots of people on the beach and out on their balconies so i know we were not the only ones to witness this.  i have searched for reported sighting and have found none, but over the years many people have reported very similar sighting of these lights with no explanations.

i have never witnessed such an event and i did not want to be one of the millions who have had sightings and never report it.  what i seen was not of this earth and it cannot be explained as balloons, chinese candles, flares, planes, helicopters ect... no movement that was seen, no noise, appeared and disappeared without incident.
content.summary: Lights appeared in a sequence and faded or dissappeared in sequence just as fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was a july afternoon, and i went out on my deck to observe the sky counting 11 chemtrials jets working, when it of nowhere this huge silver ball in comparison to the jets, appeared out of nowhere close to one of the jets. the jet did a 90degree turn to avoid this ufo. the difference in size was the jet being the size of a period and the ufo the size of a penny. the ball followed the jet into a cloud mass which was miles large, so i couldn't see them anymore.
content.summary: I was out oj my deck watching chemtrail jets. this huge ball appeared close to jet cause jet to veer left 90 degree angle. the ball followed jet until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was entering death valley, and after that i lost track of time.... i tried to keep in contact with family..... this was just after i was discharged from the marine corps. things just felt out of place and did not seem normal. i seen a ship that was so big that i just couldn't believe what i was seeing. it seemed unreal. i felt like i was in another world. the object was landed. but i also seen many other objects that just seemed to disappear.. it was as if other vehicles were on the road, but the light from these vehicles headlights seemed to deflect off of something and the light would bend in an upwards direction. i tried to take pictures with my cell phone but neither phone would function properly. eventually i felt like i drove past these objects far enough to where they would leave me alone.... i'm just really confused and have been wanting to go under hypnosis to see if it would help me....
content.summary: It felt like i was in a hologram......

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east towards mt. rainier in a town called buckley washington. it was around 9 or 10am and i was attempting to get a good picture of mt rainier with my cell phone camera. i took several pictures while moving and it was later when i got home i noticed in two images there was a grey colored object. i did not see these objects when taking the pics only observed in later photo review. when you zoom in on both pics the objects are to left of the signs. photos taken with samsung galaxy smart phone.
content.summary: Observed in pictures taken of mt. rainier later that day

content.detailedDescription:
1) once again i was standing on lower front house step of my mother's 
2)saw  an unusual bright light coming toward me i thought it was a low flying copter but it made no sound until it hovered
 3it was a bright silver with a dark silver on top it did a pivot move then turned in a 90t
   degree angle  you could see the aliens in the craft they were reptilian looking mean looking . the craft rored kind of like a train but more defined the craft looked like it could hold weapons then it looked like it hopped to the state capital the it just took off
content.summary: it had five  windows very noticeable aliens in side

content.detailedDescription: Nos encontr��bamos en la esquina de mi casa cuando observamos una figura lum��nica de m��ltiples, brillantes y extra��os colores que se acercaba a gran velocidad desde el horizonte, en diagonal hacia abajo quedando a muy corta distancia nuestra. de unos 100 metros de largo. permaneci�� suspendida por 20 minutos frente a nosotros cambiando r��pidamente de colores. nos concentramos para orar en nuestra mente y desearles paz. luego permaneci�� brillando y se desvaneci�� en el aire. no se movi��. solo se desvaneci�� desapareciendo. queda con un estado como si mi ser entero estuviera en una frecuencia de vibraci��n mas acelerada e intensa. nunca sentimos miedo.
content.summary: Objeto de gran tamaño y de muchos colores que se mantuvo por varios minutos a corta distancia, destellando múltiples colores

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home by myself from work around 11:45pm
i always look up at the dark night sky and all of a sudden i see these 2 red orange like orbs
i thought they were helicopter lights at first or flares
they hovered away from each other for a good 15 seconds until they stoppped
i couldn't believe it at first i stood still watching them hover away for a good 10 seconds i turned my back and kept walking then i turn back right when they're both about to stop.
i lost sight after they both stopped and they both simultaneously faded.
content.summary: 2 orbs hovring away from each other

content.detailedDescription: . these were 210% et's. 5 went in the "same," direction, as if it was "shooting stars." they are still in sky now if you have instruments to observe with. you obviously would. i am very meticulous in pretty much anything i do, things have to be just so.. i pay "very," close to detail.. i know what i viewed without it having to be confirmed, i know how many "satellites," are roughly put in place too and "understand," behavioural patterns of such distinctive objects.. these are not satellites.. i didn't see a moon either, which made viewing the galaxy that much easier.. these objects or "extraterrestrials vehicles," could be told apart from satellites easily by 2 determining factors; 1. movements of object & 2. i can view a satellite the whole way across till it disappears from the horizon blocking view, these white star "like," dots changed speeds, and stopped at what appears to be other stars.. they went in different directions and some in the same... it is actually an amazing feeling to know as much as i do about these species, i take pride and dig until i have a "complete," understanding of what most on this planet are "oblivious," to.. i get why we are here and i decided to share this, especially if it will help with further study, i know i always "love," a "fresh," perspective.. if people could even begin to really comprehend what is around us everyday, i believe this place would be a little different then what we see today.. we need to move forward and expand our minds.. multiverse is the limits!! thank you "very," much for this "opportunity," and "privilege," to express/ share these thoughts and my experience earlier tonight..
content.summary: Ok i am very meticulous in "any," thing i do.. these were 210% et's. 5 went in the "same," direction, as if it was "shooting stars." they are still in sky now if you have instruments to observe with..

content.detailedDescription:
While walking home from neighbors house one evening there was a lightening storm in the distant sky. i was taking pictures of the lightening in the sw sky a light came in from the se sky into my field of vision than quickly changed direction abruptly. 

at first i didn't really didn't think much of it because it happened so quickly.
when i started looking at the lightening pics i found two unexplained images among the several pics all taken within about 30 second.

one is a distinct oval image hovering in the sky
while the other appears to be side image of the object.

the pics are on my i phone.
content.summary: Light in the sky going one direction than quickly changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday, june 19, 2014, at about 9:30 p.M. i heard a throbbing sound outside the house.  it was not quite like a helicopter sound but reminiscent.  i decided to look closer at the skies from several directions.  with my astronomical binoculars, i started scanning.

1.	first i noted a cluster of many pulsating lights in a rough spherical arrangement in a sse direction which disappeared from view behind a neighboring roof.  they did not reappear even though i waited.
2.	next i noticed pulsing lights from the left and right sides of the field of view that were travelling toward each other.  the pulsing lights normally looked like two lights blinking off and on varying in color.  occasionally a third light seemed to be present.  the two lights kept changing configuration with respect to one another despite the forward direction of travel.  when the lights came close together they both stopped, and then reversed direction.  the altitude and location from my vantage was between the stars antares on the right and sabik on the left.
3.	a few minutes later a pulsing light was seen travelling from the right slightly above the roof line of the neighboring house toward the left.  at the same time, another pulsating lights travelled directly toward the fist lights from the left again.  suddenly the left lights increased in speed toward the right group, and then abruptly stopped.  it hovered, then moved up to allow the first lights to continue travelling from right to left.  the one travelling to the left eventually disappeared behind the tree line, and the right one at the higher altitude continued on.
4.	later, another set of the pulsing lights travelled from left to right, then slowed, and rose vertically and stopped to hover again.   at this point i noticed an airplane had come into view and was coming generally toward my direction on the right but stayed on that side and seemed to be going in the direction of mci (the airport).  the hovering lights seemed to be observing the aircraft.  then they continued once the aircraft was out of my sight travelling still toward the right, and made a large arc downward and in a direction to follow the airplane��� but slower.  

note:  most of the time, the pulsating lights would be either red or orange, green, white.   this was a characteristic of all the lights in the four occurrences.  the pulsing and change of direction of the lights never became static, that is, they kept changing in location although it was obvious that they were on the same craft.

the total time period was from 9:33 pm to 10:25 pm.   the direction of most of this was from the east to the southwest for boundaries of the entire series of events.  it would be difficult to estimate the distance of these lights exactly.   the best estimate would be to approximate the distance to the aircraft, which i would judge to be about 3.2 miles away, or over the southern end of lake jacomo which would be 2.5 miles distant.  (assuming the aircraft was at 11,500 feet when at 39 miles from the airport on landing approach).
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights over lee's summit

content.detailedDescription:
Resubmitting this again.

at approximately 6:00 pm pst, i was sitting on my front porch when i noticed a large hawk. out the corner of my eye, i noticed what looked like a star. when i actually observed the object, i noticed it was just hovering. the object remained their for till around 6:20 pm.

steve lemaster
lynden, wa
content.summary: Orb hovering in the air under a cloud

content.detailedDescription:
10:04 pm         june 18, 2014                            
     i was sitting outside my beach front hotel room overlooking the ocean near 2nd street south in north myrtle beach. when in front of me was a section in the sky that looked like lights blinking on and off directly out over the ocean. these lights were white lights. there were at least fifteen of them in a large group. i knocked on the door and let the others in the room know what was going on. they came out and saw the event as well. then within the swarm as i���m going to call it, came these red circular lights that seemed to skip across the sky.
     the swarm moved slowly up the beach over about a 5 minute interval. then started moving back down the beach over another 5 minute interval or so. then as a plane was flying down the coastline above. it moved out to sea, then it moved down the beach and out of our sight. it blinked with those red circles at least fifteen to twenty times over the whole event which lasted at least 25 minutes.
     i walked out on the beach near the end of the event and another guy asked if i saw the ufo. him and a girl with him was on the beach watching it as well.
content.summary: Myrtle beach ufo

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting out side on the front porch, when i observed a large hawk. then a bright orb caught my.
content.summary: Bright orb

content.detailedDescription: Single spherical object very high in the sky though showing recognizable slow movement. two more show up. the first moves toward the stationary two and firm a triangle. the spheres moves slowly apart as the first one stops moving northward thought the pair continue. as the pair move north, the spread slowly losing the rectangier shape.
content.summary: One white star like sphere joined by teo more.

content.detailedDescription:
First observed three red-orange lights in a triangle shape and another three
red-orange lights behind them at 30th and morris streets. we pulled over at 29th and morris streets and got out of the car to look.I shined a spot light at the lights to see if i would get a reaction. the lights were still 
moving so i got back in the car and followed them to the 1400 block of dover street and got of the car again to observe and they appeared to be lower in the sky and were still moving in the same direction across the sky. when they were above the homes and out of sight we got back in the car again and follow they to 27th and grays ferry avenue and by this time we only saw one of them.
after it passed over us we noticed a search light shining up in the clouds and a plane with its navigation lights on.
content.summary: Observed six red-orange lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to work on a natural gas well site outside uniontown, pa off of route 51 last june the sky was dark and it was raining hard, there was thunder, lightening. as i got closer to the well site the rain stopped and as i was backing up into my parking spot i noticed a rainbow in my mirror. i stepped out of my truck i saw the rainbow, thought it would make a nice photo so i took two with my cell phone. one after the other. did my shift and that was that.
i was going through the photos in my phone last week and i saw something in those rainbow photos that i didn't notice before.
i would like you to analyze them and let me know what you think it is if it's possible.
i would like to say that i didn't notice anything when i took the photos.  
thank you
content.summary: Observed an orb in phots
